description: Casa Vegana is a plant-based food company founded by a couple who transformed a struggling business into a thriving brand over eight years. They prioritize artisanal production, using natural ingredients without preservatives, while navigating the challenges of scaling up. Despite facing market pressures, they aim to maintain their core values of sustainability and healthy eating. With a focus on growth, they explore new product lines and potential export opportunities, reflecting a commitment to both quality and environmental consciousness.
name: Casa Vegana
